بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذا ما اشترت ساره ابنة قلته القزّاز زوجة إيــسدط بن بييسة
التّنّيسيّ السّاكنة يومئذ بمدينة الأشمونيــن من المكنّا بأبو اليمن وأخوه
جميل ــهما ســكريس بن السّفطي ووالدتهم //
قرا ابنة جريج جميع النّصــف من المنزل الّذي بهذه المــدينة المــعــروفة
إرتهم عن والدهم سكريس بن السّفــطي المتوفّا وهو اثنا عشر سهما من
أربعة وعشــريــن سهما شائعة غير مقسومة من جميع المنزل المقدّم
ذكره فــي الوجه البحري من هذه المدينة شهدت بمضمونه
مامليــن بن والدّار المعروفة كانت كانت تعــرف بأبي الطّيّب بن أبي الوزير
ثمّ عرفت بغطارف بن مفلح ويحيــط بهذا المنزل ويشتمل عليه حدود أربعة
فالحدّ القبليّ منه ينتهي إلى ا ملك لأحمد البنّاذالپپاد والحد //
البحري منه ينتهي إلى منزل إرثهم عن والدهم سكريس بن هميسه
المعروف بالسّــفطيّ والحدّ الشّــرقي منه ينتهي إلى طرق الــمارّة وفيه يشرع
بابه والحد الغربي منه ينتهي إلى اصطبل المكنّا بأبو السّري الخيّاط
مع البئر الما المعينة الّتي في هذا الحد من حقوق هذا المنزل الّذي وقع
البيع على النّصف منه بحد ذلك وحدوده وأرضه وبنائه وسفله
وعلوه ونقضه ومرافقه كلّها وكل حق هو له داخل فيه وكل
حق هو له خارج منه وجميع ما يعرف له وينسب إليه ظاهره
وباطنه عامره وغامره بثمن مبلغه دينار واحد ونصف دينار بالــصّــحــيح
عينا ذهبا جيادا جياد النّقد شرى صحيحا وبيعا نافذا ماضيا لا شرط
فــيه ولا عدة ولا خــيار ولا اســتتنــى ولا هو على سبيل رهن ودفعت
المشترية ساره ابنة قلته القزّاز زوجة إيسدط بن ييسبهيييسة التّنّيسي إلى البايعين
الــمكنّا بأبو اليــمن وأخوه جميل
بن السّفطي مع د
ومبلغه دينار واحد ونصف
وحازته لــنفسها وصــار في يدها ومالا من
مالها فما أدرك هذه المشترية من درك
من أحــد من النّاس كلّهم وــن البائعين خلاصها في ذمّتهم ومحياهــم
ومماتهم وخــالص مالهم على ما يــوجبه حكم بيع الإسلام وعهدته
وضمان دركه وتضمّنوا بها جميع الدّرك في ذلك كلّه شهد على
إقــرار البائعين بالبيع وقبضهم جميع الثّمن والمشترية بالحوز لنفسها
في صحّة عقولهــم وأبدانهم وجواز أمورهم طائعين غير مكرهين
ولا مجبرين وذلك في العشر الأوسط من شوّال سنة تسع //
وخمسين وأربعمائة وفيه لحق حرف مثاله النّصف وأيضا تكرير حرف
منهم وبذلك وقعت الشّهادة شهد أحمد بن الحسين بن محمّد بن سواهل على إقرار
الرحلپن الرّجل والثلثة نسوة البائعين بالبيع وقبض جميع
الثّمن المذكور وضمانهم عن جميل الطّفل وحوز المشترية
بما فيه في تأريخه
شهد حكم بن عبد الحميد بن صباح بن جميل
علــى إقرار الرّجل للبيع والنّسوة المسمّين
وضمانهم البائعين عن جميل الطّفل وحوز المشترية
فيــه وكتب بخطّه في تأريخه
شهد محمّد بن الحسين الكتاب الصّداق وكتب
وشهد حمدون بن ميمون بجميع ما
وكتب عنه خضر بن عبــد
المشترية بما فيه في تأريخه

[In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.]
[This is what Sâra, daughter of Qolte, the silk-mercer, the wife of I]sidoṭos, son [of Bîsa]
[originating from Tinnîs, residing at this time in the town of al-Ušmûnai]n, [has bought] from the surnamed Abuʾl-Yumn and his brother
[Ǧamîl .............................. Sa]krîs b. as-Safṭî and their mother
Qerâ, daughter of Ǧuraiǧ, the whole ha[lf o]f the dwelling house, which is in this well known town,
their inheritance from their deceased father Sakrîs b. [as-Saf]ṭî, and these are twelve shares of
[twenty four] shares, shared in common, undivided, of the whole afore[said] dwelling house
... in the neighbourhood of the Mosque of [in] the northern region of this town, in the quarter of the standard-makers and in the neighbourhood of the two ...............................
[Ibn Mâmalî]n and the well-known house ... [............] mosques and the well-known house was [formerly] known under (the name of) Abuʾṭ-Ṭayyib b. Abiʾl-Wazîr
[(and) then was known under (the name of) Ġaṭârif b. Mufliḥ]. [Now] four boundaries enclo[se] and surround [this dwelling house]:
[the southern boundary thereof extends to .........] the property of Aḥmad, the standard-maker; and the northern
boundary thereof [extends to the dwelling house ...............] their [inheritance] from their father Sakrîs b. Homîse,
known as as-Sa[fṭî; and the eastern boundary] thereof extends to the main thoroughfares with which its door
communicates; and the western boundary thereof extends to the stable of the surnamed Abuʾs-Sarî, the tailor,
including the well of running water, situated within this boundary, being part of the rights of this dwelling house, of the half
of which the sale has been effected, to the limit thereof and its boundaries, and its land and its building(s) and (including what is) below
and above the surface, and its beams and all its appurtenances, and every right connected with it within and every
right connected with it without, and all that is known as appertaining and relating to it, (be it) outside
or inside, inhabited or empty, for a price which amounts to one and a half dînârs, [cor]rect[ly] minted,
good gold-coins, in cash, in form of a valid purchase and an effectal (fully) completed sale, in which is no condition
and no promise and op[tion (of return) and no reser]vation, and it is not in the way of a pledge; and the buyer
Sâra, d[aughter of Qolte, the silk-mercer, the wife of Isido]tos, son of Bîsa, originating of Tinnîs, has paid to the sellers,
the surnamed Abuʾl-Yu[mn and his brother Ǧamîl .................. daughter of Sakrîs]
b. as-Safṭî [........................]
which amounts [to one and a half dînârs ........................]
[.............................. and she has acquired possession of it for] herself, [and it has pas]sed into her hand(s) and become her own
[property ............... . But should any evil] consequence (vindicatio) ensue to this buyer
[from a]ny person whatever [.................. it is incumbent upon] the sellers to indemnify her according to their responsibility, be [they] alive
[or dead, and out of their o]wn means; according to what the rule of Islamic law of sale and covenant
[and the guarantee of its indeminity makes obligatory, and] they have guaranteed her against all claims respecting all this. (The following witnesses) have testified to the
[ackn]owledgment [by the sellers respecting the ]sale and their having received the whole price, and by the buyer respecting her having taken possession of it for herself,
they being in a state of sound mind and body and capable of transacting their business, voluntarily, without compulsion
and not against their will, and this in the middle decade of Šawwâl of the year four
hundred and fifty nine. And herein has been added a word, viz. "the half", and also there (is to be found) the repetition of a word, viz.
"minhum", and testimony has been given to it. Aḥmad b. al-Ḥusain b. Muḥammad b. Sawâhil is witness to the acknowledgment
by the men and the three women, who have sold, respecting the sale and the taking over the whole of
the (above) mentioned price and their guarantee for the infant Ǧamîl, and the taking possession by the buyer
of what (is contained) herein on its date.
Ḥakam b. ʿAbd al-Ḥamîd b. Ṣabâḥ b. Ǧamîl is witness
to the ackno[wledg]ment by the men respecting the sale and by the aforesaid women,
[...] and their guarantee for the infant Ǧamîl, and the taking possession by the buyer
[of what (is contained) here]in, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting.
Muhammad b. al-Ḥusain b. ʿĪsâ is witness to the acknowledgment by the men
